# TooNet

**TooNet** is a non-profit open-world query initiative. It is a foundational component of the **TOO (To Operate Open-world)** ecosystem.

## Vision
Our mission is to provide an open, transparent, and high-efficiency query infrastructure for autonomous agents and AI systems operating in the open world.

## Project Ecosystem
- **TooPort**: Commercial encapsulation layer and transaction assurance.
- **TooNet**: Open data and query initiative (Non-profit).

## Links
- **Official Website**: [toonet.ai](https://toonet.ai)
- **Organization**: [TOO Project](https://github.com/toonet)

*Note: This package is currently a placeholder for the TooNet initiative.*
